mention.text: four police agents from the boyaca command kidnapped by the so-called army of national liberation
police agents jesus bernardo bustos , miguel angel garcia , jairo vargas , and esteban galviz
an action in favor of a more humanized war , which is a slogan these guerrillas have proclaimed in the past 5 years
